 Initializes a newly allocated _CPFillColor object with the provided color.
Drawing

 Draws the color into the given graphics context inside the provided rectangle.
(void) - fillPathInContext:
 Draws the color into the given graphics context clipped to the current drawing path.

Detailed Description

Draws CPColor area fills.

Drawing methods are provided to fill rectangular areas and arbitrary drawing paths.

Member Function Documentation
